AddDiskReplicaPair.title: AddDiskReplicaPair
AddDiskReplicaPair.summary: Adds a replication pair to a replication pair-consistent group. You can use a replication pair-consistent group to batch manage replication pairs. When you call this operation, you can specify parameters, such as ReplicaGroupId, ReplicaPairId, and ClientToken, in the request.

ApplyLensService.title: ApplyLensService
ApplyLensService.summary: Cancels Elastic Block Storage data insight (CloudLens for EBS).

BindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.title: BindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy
BindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.summary: Bind disks into a enterprise-level snapshot policy.

CancelLensService.title: CancelLensService
CancelLensService.summary: Cancels Elastic Block Storage data insight (CloudLens for EBS).

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which an Elastic Block Storage (EBS) resource belongs.

ClearPairDrill.title: ClearPairDrill
ClearPairDrill.summary: Clears the disaster recovery drills that were initiated from the secondary disk of a replication pair and deletes the auto-created drill disks.

ClearReplicaGroupDrill.title: ClearReplicaGroupDrill
ClearReplicaGroupDrill.summary: Clears the disaster recovery drills that were initiated from the secondary disks of a replication pair-consistent group and deletes the auto-created drill disks.

CreateDedicatedBlockStorageCluster.title: CreateDedicatedBlockStorageCluster
CreateDedicatedBlockStorageCluster.summary: Creates a dedicated block storage cluster. When you call this operation, you can specify parameters, such as Azone, Capacity, Type, and PeriodUnit, in the request.

CreateDiskReplicaPair.title: CreateDiskReplicaPair
CreateDiskReplicaPair.summary: Creates a replication pair to asynchronously replicate data between disks.

DescribeDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDisk.title: DescribeDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDisks
DescribeDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDisk.summary: Queries information about cloud disks in a dedicated block storage cluster.

DescribeDiskEvents.title: DescribeDiskEvents
DescribeDiskEvents.summary: Queries the risk events of a disk. The operation is getting offline. Switch to the new operation DescribeEvents.

DescribeDiskMonitorData.title: DescribeDiskMonitorData
DescribeDiskMonitorData.summary: Queries fine-grained monitoring data of a disk.

DescribeDiskMonitorDataList.title: DescribeDiskMonitorDataList
DescribeDiskMonitorDataList.summary: Queries fine-grained monitoring data of multiple disks. You can query only the burst performance data of ESSD AutoPL disks. The data is aggregated by hour.

DescribeDiskReplicaGroups.title: DescribeDiskReplicaGroups
DescribeDiskReplicaGroups.summary: Queries the details of replication pair-consistent groups in a specific region.

DescribeDiskReplicaPairProgress.title: DescribeDiskReplicaPairProgress
DescribeDiskReplicaPairProgress.summary: Queries the replication progress of a replication pair.

DescribeDiskReplicaPairs.title: DescribeDiskReplicaPairs
DescribeDiskReplicaPairs.summary: Queries information about replication pairs in a specific region.

DescribeEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.title: DescribeEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy
DescribeEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.summary: Queries the information about enterprise-level snapshot policies. When you call this operation, you can specify parameters, such as PolicyIds, ResourceGroupId, and Tag, in the request.

DescribeEvents.title: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.summary: Queries the risk events of a disk.

DescribeLensMonitorDisks.title: DescribeLensMonitorDisks
DescribeLensMonitorDisks.summary: Queries one or more Elastic Block Storage (EBS) devices that you created.

DescribeLensServiceStatus.title: DescribeLensServiceStatus
DescribeLensServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of CloudLens for EBS.

DescribePairDrills.title: DescribePairDrills
DescribePairDrills.summary: Queries the disaster recovery drills that were performed on the replication pair whose secondary disk resides in a specific region.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the details of regions in which Elastic Block Storage (EBS) features (such as async replication, CloudLens for EBS, and Dedicated Block Storage Cluster) are supported.

DescribeReplicaGroupDrills.title: DescribeReplicaGroupDrills
DescribeReplicaGroupDrills.summary: Queries the disaster recovery drills that were performed on the replication pair-consistent group whose secondary disk resides in a specific region.

DescribeSolutionInstanceConfiguration.title: DescribeSolutionInstanceConfiguration
DescribeSolutionInstanceConfiguration.summary: Queries the default configurations of a solution.

DescribeUserTagKeys.title: DescribeUserTagKeys
DescribeUserTagKeys.summary: Centralized Role: Query User Disk Snapshot tagKeys

DescribeUserTagValues.title: DescribeUserTagValues
DescribeUserTagValues.summary: Centralized Role: Query User Disk and Snapshot tagValues

FailoverDiskReplicaGroup.title: FailoverDiskReplicaGroup
FailoverDiskReplicaGroup.summary: Enables the failover feature for replication pairs in a replication pair-consistent group. When the primary disks of specific replication pairs in a replication pair-consistent group fail, you can call this operation to enable the read and write permissions on the secondary disks.

FailoverDiskReplicaPair.title: FailoverDiskReplicaPair
FailoverDiskReplicaPair.summary: Enables the failover feature for replication pairs.

GetReport.title: Get User Cloud Disk Usage Report
GetReport.summary: Centralized Role: Obtain User Usage Report with reportId

ListReports.title: ListReports
ListReports.summary: Queries historical reports of a specific application.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to EBS resources, or queries the IDs and tags of resources in a non-default resource group.

ModifyDedicatedBlockStorageClusterAttrib.title: ModifyDedicatedBlockStorageClusterAttribute
ModifyDedicatedBlockStorageClusterAttrib.summary: Modifies the information of a dedicated elastic block storage cluster.

ModifyDiskReplicaGroup.title: ModifyDiskReplicaGroup
ModifyDiskReplicaGroup.summary: Modifies the name, description, or recovery point objective (RPO) of a replication pair-consistent group.

QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThr.title: QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThroughputStatus
QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThr.summary: Query the throughput status of a dedicated block storage cluster disk which has been set through the SetDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThroughput API.

QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterInvento.title: QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterInventoryData
QueryDedicatedBlockStorageClusterInvento.summary: Queries the capacity trend data of a dedicated Elastic Block Storage (EBS) cluster within a specific time period, including the available capacity and total capacity.

RemoveDiskReplicaPair.title: RemoveDiskReplicaPair
RemoveDiskReplicaPair.summary: Removes a replication pair from a replication pair-consistent group. After a replication pair is removed from a replication pair-consistent group, the pair is disassociated from the group but is not deleted.

ReprotectDiskReplicaGroup.title: ReprotectDiskReplicaGroup
ReprotectDiskReplicaGroup.summary: Enables the reverse replication feature for replication pairs that belong to a replication pair-consistent group. After reverse replication is enabled, data stored on the original secondary disks is replicated to the original primary disks. When a reverse replication is being performed, the primary and secondary sites of the replication pair-consistent group remain unchanged, but data is replicated from the secondary site to the primary site.

ReprotectDiskReplicaPair.title: ReprotectDiskReplicaPair
ReprotectDiskReplicaPair.summary: Enables the reverse replication feature for a replication pair.

SetDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThrou.title: SetDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThroughput
SetDedicatedBlockStorageClusterDiskThrou.summary: In the elastic type dedicated block storage cluster, you can easily achieve the specified throughput (Bps) for the target disk. You only need to set the cloud disk ID and the target throughput, simplifying the process of configuring.

StartDiskReplicaGroup.title: StartDiskReplicaGroup
StartDiskReplicaGroup.summary: Enables the async replication feature for replication pairs that belong to a replication pair-consistent group. The first time the async replication feature is enabled for the replication pairs, the system performs a full synchronization to synchronize all data from disks at the primary site (primary disks) to disks at the secondary site (secondary disks). Then, the system periodically synchronizes incremental data based on the recovery point objective (RPO) of the replication pair-consistent group.

StartDiskReplicaPair.title: StartDiskReplicaPair
StartDiskReplicaPair.summary: Activates the async replication feature for a specific replication pair.

StartPairDrill.title: StartPairDrill
StartPairDrill.summary: Starts a disaster recovery drill to ensure the continued replication and clone the data from the last recovery point of the secondary disk to a new disk. This helps you test the completeness and correctness of applications that are deployed on the disaster recovery site on a regular basis.

StartReplicaGroupDrill.title: StartReplicaGroupDrill
StartReplicaGroupDrill.summary: Starts a disaster recovery drill in a replication pair-consistent group to ensure the continued replication and restores data from the latest recovery point of secondary disks to new disks. This helps test the completeness and correctness of applications that are deployed on the disaster recovery site on a regular basis.

StopDiskReplicaGroup.title: StopDiskReplicaGroup
StopDiskReplicaGroup.summary: Stops a replication pair-consistent group. This operation stops all replication pairs in the replication pair-consistent group.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds the tags to Elastic Block Storage (EBS) resources.

UnbindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.title: UnbindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy
UnbindEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.summary: Unbind disks from a enterprise-level snapshot policy.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from specified Elastic Block Storage (EBS) resources.

UpdateEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.title: UpdateEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy
UpdateEnterpriseSnapshotPolicy.summary: Search for a enterprise-level snapshot policy.

UpdateSolutionInstanceAttribute.title: UpdateSolutionInstanceAttribute
UpdateSolutionInstanceAttribute.summary: Updates the attributes of a solution instance.
